channel.title: 2006 Remade
channel.description:
Okay hey guys I know this thread is going to suck but it's w/e i just need 1 or two server developers and a web developer for my server thread is here --> http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,585824.0.html
Also to go to the website go here: http://2006remade.web44.net/index.php
Base: [b]PI[/b]
Server Developers: Me - ( mod tom ) Zuka - ( Mod Event )
Web developers: Mod Jake
GFX: Open
Format to join: [code]Name: Age: Applying For: Experience: Evidence of previous works: How active will you be: Skype:[/code]

item.title: 2006 Remade
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

aerialprojects:

Mkay Will how about you try it and tell me if it works for you.

What exactly are you asking Ruby to try? Are you saying that there’s no DeltaScape Base with an older Game Frame + the Lunar Magick Tab? I promise you that this can be done. This is Client-sided by the way except for functionality.

EDIT: You can’t just go around saying ‘I’m the best’, and not expect to get called out. I’ve said that I’m the most creative Designer, but I’ve proved it.

Read full topic

item.title: 2006 Remade
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“aerialprojects, post:23, topic:469352”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=586511.msg4166967#msg4166967 date=1353812892]
Okay, first off;

[quote author=aerialprojects link=topic=586511.msg4166893#msg4166893 date=1353808878]
LOL about to kO this Devoplement thread this:

[ol][li]You Dont have lunar[/li][/ol]

And from experince:

There isnt a pi with lunar and or even a delta with old gameframe so If you want to get Lunar go remake the rsinterface class haha.
[/quote]Um… What exactly was that? I could hardly make out anything you’re saying except for this:

[quote author=aerialprojects link=topic=586511.msg4166893#msg4166893 date=1353808878]
There isnt a pi with lunar and or even a delta with old gameframe so If you want to get Lunar go remake the rsinterface class haha.
[/quote]There is plenty of them. If you’d actually do your research - you’d know exactly what I’m talking about. Even if it didn’t have the Lunar spell book - all it would take was to just ‘plug everything in’; adding sprites, placing them, etc. etc. It’s basic work minors could accomplish. Rewrite class RSInterface? Quite a pointless chore.

Agreed this isn’t the area to talk about it But i bet i can smash you in Php or w.e Programming language of your choice its luck that your Web Dev in moparscape, not that i want it.
[/quote]If you really do not truly want it - then why do you egg it on? You’re tempting Ruby to just take the offer and possibly [most definitely] ‘destroy’ you in that task. I, personally, would love to see that happen.

If it is as easy as you make it seem please do that and post it.[/quote]Me? You’re going around flaunting, “I can say i am the Best, Web Coder & Designer in ‘Moparscape’.”, if you think you are - show us.

Read full topic

item.title: 2006 Remade
item.dc:creator: @aerialprojects aerialprojects
item.description:
@aerialprojects wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:22, topic:469352”]Okay, first off;

[quote author=aerialprojects link=topic=586511.msg4166893#msg4166893 date=1353808878]
LOL about to kO this Devoplement thread this:

[ol][li]You Dont have lunar[/li][/ol]

And from experince:

There isnt a pi with lunar and or even a delta with old gameframe so If you want to get Lunar go remake the rsinterface class haha.
[/quote]Um… What exactly was that? I could hardly make out anything you’re saying except for this:

[quote author=aerialprojects link=topic=586511.msg4166893#msg4166893 date=1353808878]
There isnt a pi with lunar and or even a delta with old gameframe so If you want to get Lunar go remake the rsinterface class haha.
[/quote]There is plenty of them. If you’d actually do your research - you’d know exactly what I’m talking about. Even if it didn’t have the Lunar spell book - all it would take was to just ‘plug everything in’; adding sprites, placing them, etc. etc. It’s basic work minors could accomplish. Rewrite class RSInterface? Quite a pointless chore.

[quote author=aerialprojects link=topic=586511.msg4166920#msg4166920 date=1353810112]
Agreed this isn’t the area to talk about it But i bet i can smash you in Php or w.e Programming language of your choice its luck that your Web Dev in moparscape, not that i want it.
[/quote]If you really do not truly want it - then why do you egg it on? You’re tempting Ruby to just take the offer and possibly [most definitely] ‘destroy’ you in that task. I, personally, would love to see that happen.[/quote]

If it is as easy as you make it seem please do that and post it.

Read full topic
